document.full_text: actors from the tv comedy "happy days" filed a $10 million lawsuit against cbs and paramount on tuesday over profits from merchandising on everything from casino slot machines to t-shirts.
document.title: "happy days" actors sue over merchandising revenue
lines_and_colors: actors from the tv comedy "happy days" filed a $10 million lawsuit against cbs and paramount on tuesday over profits from merchandising on everything from casino slot machines to t-shirts.
